It's really sad when you think about it.  Part of the blame for sag lies with case manufacturers :/

JayzTwoCents had a video covering this.  Those little slots that act as a guard and help slot the card into the case?

The case can actually act as a support.  Depends on whether or not the slots for them are a tight fit or not.
If the slots are really wide, the card will sag.  Tight fit, no lag.
